SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, TT.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT FEED.* FROM FEED, (SELECT * FROM FOLLOW WHERE FROM_ID = #{u_id})FW WHERE FEED.U_ID = FW.TO_ID OR FEED.U_ID = #{u_id} ORDER BY F_IDX DESC) TT) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{begin}) AND TO_NUMBER(#{end})
